This is the Nozomi Super Express bound for Tokyo.
We'll be stopping at Kyoto, Nagoya, Shin-Yokohama and Shinagawa stations...
Smoking is not allowed on this train except in the designated smoking rooms...
The smoking room in car number ten is for passengers in the green cars.
Please refrain from smoking in the train including areas at either end of the cars.
The conductor's room is in car number eight.
